name: Losing Control (Mehmet Selim CAN)
description:
Ctrl+C Ctrl+V your way through this little Puzzle Game and help a robot friend navigate through different levels.

In "Losing Control" you help a little robot through a world that is falling apart only using his ability to copy and paste. 

There is only a limited amount of CTRL keys to solve each level. So be careful what you use them for. CTRL+C to copy and CTRL+V to paste affect not only the regular floor tiles but also duplicate the VOID surrounding the broken paths.
